entry.title: Podcast has moved to Spotify
entry.summary: We have decided to move the podcast for some technical reasons as many listeners were having difficulties listening to us. The good news is that we are now on Spotify! You will be able to subscribe and keep up with the podcast there. Below is a listing of all of â€¦
entry.content: We have decided to move the podcast for some technical reasons as many listeners were having difficulties listening to us. The good news is that we are now on Spotify! You will be able to subscribe and keep up with the podcast there. Below is a listing of all of the episodes recorded so far.
